channel.title: Posts on Sledgehog Software
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Sledgehog Software

item.title: A Frail Qubit Devlog #005 - Hey, Another Long Break!
item.description: 2020: A Year in Review 2020 was a hectic year for everyone, including me. COVID turned up suddenly in March and morphed the ‘Normal’ into something more blatantly depressing, sad, and alienating.

item.title: A Frail Qubit Devlog #004 - What's Been Going On?
item.description: Updates, Updates, Updates, and yet more Updates! Sorry for the late post! While I was going to release this a lot sooner (a couple of days after my “It’s Alive” post), I was close to completing a lot of the features that are most exciting (to me at least)!

item.title: It's Alive; Or, how I came to revamp this blog.
item.description: The blog is alive! And much different! … Wait, how long was I gone for? 11 MONTHS? And what the ever living fuck is ‘A Frail Qubit’?

item.title: Cubytes Devlog #003 - Hiatus No More
item.description: After quite a while with radio silence (nearly two months…) coming from Sledgehog Software, here comes this devlog. Hooray. First of all, it was a fat break.

item.title: Web Development, Head First
item.description: When I first thought of the prospect of making my own company, I quickly realized that I needed to have some sort of online presence (read: website).

item.title: Cubytes Devlog #002
item.description: As 2018 left and 2019 came, Cubytes received some tweaks and thoughts to the core game added to it recently.

item.title: Cubytes Devlog #001
item.description: Why a Devlog? While it is indeed quite late into development, which might not make sense, however it’s something to show my day to day progress.

item.title: URL and Closed Development
item.description: The blog now has a custom URL! This took some time to sort out (Mostly DNS related issues… this Blogger instance is running on a DreamHost DNS, which is the main website is setup.

item.title: Alpha 7
item.description: The wait for Alpha 7 is finally over, and with it comes brand-new additions such as Lasers, Cheat Codes, and Revamped Graphics!

item.title: Alpha 7 When?
item.description: tomorrow. Simple as that. Alpha 7. 9pm. Be here.

item.title: Alpha 6
item.description: Alpha 6 is now available to download! The main new features for this release is Arcade Mode and Black Holes!

item.title: Future Cubytes Releases
item.description: Outdated Please note that this blog post was created when I had brainworms. None of these features are ‘in stone’, as I publically said in this blog.
